description: This CSS file contains styles and variables for theming, including both light and dark mode color schemes as well as styles for various components of the application.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Main application container with centered text and background color management based on theme.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Header section of the application with flexible layout for proper alignment and styling based on theme.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links within the application reflecting text secondary color.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Button for toggling the theme, styled for responsiveness and interactive features.
